title: 7-Eleven targeted in immigration operation
text:
7-Eleven targeted in immigration operation Wednesday, January 10, 2018 - 01:22 
U.S. immigration agents fanned out to nearly 100 7-Eleven convenience stores nationwide on Wednesday, arresting 21 people suspected of being in the country illegally and giving owners a tight deadline to prove other employees are authorized to work.   
U.S. immigration agents fanned out to nearly 100 7-Eleven convenience stores nationwide on Wednesday, arresting 21 people suspected of being in the country illegally and giving owners a tight deadline to prove other employees are authorized to work.  //reut.rs/2ANA8Ok
